text: 13:9 Khong 20:14; Aniwa 5:18; Khong 20:13; Aniwa 5:17; Khong 20:15; Aniwa 5:19; Khong 20:17; Aniwa 5:21; Levi 19:18Wayel yathangsingdi, “Nahakna mitu miwa lannaroidabani,” “Nahakna mi hatloidabani,” “Nahakna huranloidabani,” “Nahakna aranba sakhi piroidabani,” “Nahakna karamloidabani,” aduga atoppa yathangsing leirabasu hairiba yathang asida suplabani, “Nahakna nahakki yumlon keironnabasingbu nasamakkumna nungsiyu.”
